p.k: 8 – 11 year olds: Did you know that you can create pictures not only with paints? Plasticine, sand, flour, and even… shaving cream – all of these can be used to create masterpieces of children’s art.
p.d: You will learn how to make a beautiful end simple picture using unusual techniques with your child. Take some plasticine, paints, cocktail straws – and we’ll end up with a picture of the universe.
